Namespace Boose_Testing

Classes

BooseTesting

Unit tests for the application canvas implementation AppCanvas. Verifies basic drawing operations update the internal pen position as expected.

BooseTesting.AppCanvasTests

Verifies that MoveTo(int, int) updates the pen position to the supplied coordinates.

BooseTesting.AppCircleTests

BooseTesting.AppCommandTests

Unit tests for the abstract AppCommand class. Includes tests for parameter handling, compilation, and program registration.

BooseTesting.AppCommandTests.TestCommand

Test-only concrete AppCommand implementation to observe behavior. Overrides checkparameters(string[]) to mark invocation.

BooseTesting.AppCommandTests.TestVariable

Minimal concrete AppEvaluation to register a variable in AppStoredProgram variable table.

BooseTesting.AppPenColour

BooseTesting.AppPenColour.TestCanvas

Minimal canvas implementation to capture SetColour calls for testing.

BooseTesting.AppStoredProgramTest

BooseTesting.AppStoredProgramTest.DummyCommand

Dummy command for testing. Marks itself executed when Execute() is called.

BooseTesting.AppStoredProgramTest.TestVariable

Minimal concrete AppEvaluation implementation for testing variable storage.

BooseTesting.AppStoredProgramTest.ThrowingCommand

Dummy command that throws a BOOSE.BOOSEException when executed, for testing exception handling.

BooseTesting.AppWriteTests

BooseTesting.AppWriteTests.TestCanvas

A minimal BOOSE.Canvas implementation for testing AppWrite. Records the last text written to the canvas.

BooseTesting.AppcondtionalCommandtest

Unit tests for AppConditionalCommand. Verifies conditional command execution and parameter rules.

BooseTesting.AppcondtionalCommandtest.AppConditionalCommandTests

Helper methods and tests for AppConditionalCommand.

BooseTesting.AppcondtionalCommandtest.AppConditionalCommandTests.TestVariable

Minimal concrete AppEvaluation used for variable resolution in tests.

BooseTesting.appbooltest

Unit tests for AppBool command. Verifies boolean variable registration, evaluation, and parameter handling.

BooseTesting.appcommand1test

BooseTesting.appcommand2param

Unit tests for AppCommand2Param. Verifies that commands expecting exactly two parameters enforce parameter count rules and compile correctly.

BooseTesting.appcommand3param

Unit tests for AppCommand3Param. Verifies that commands expecting exactly three parameters enforce parameter count rules and compile correctly.

BooseTesting.appcommandfactorytest

BooseTesting.appcompoundcommandtest

Unit tests for AppCompoundCommand. Validates parameter rules for comparison-based commands.

BooseTesting.appelsetest

BooseTesting.appendtest

Unit tests for Append command. Verifies compilation and execution behavior for end-of-block logic.

BooseTesting.appevaluationtest

BooseTesting.appevaluationtest.TestEvaluation

Minimal concrete implementation of AppEvaluation for testing purposes.

BooseTesting.appevaluationtest.TestVariable

Minimal concrete AppEvaluation used for variable resolution in tests.

BooseTesting.appiftest

Unit tests for Appif command. Verifies program counter behavior and condition evaluation.

BooseTesting.appiftest.TestProgram

A test program that fakes EvaluateExpression calls for Appif.

BooseTesting.appinttest

Unit tests for AppInt command. Verifies variable registration, integer assignment, and exception handling.

BooseTesting.appinttest.TestVariable

Minimal concrete AppEvaluation used for variable resolution in tests.

BooseTesting.apprealtest

Unit tests for AppReal command. Verifies variable registration, real number evaluation, and exception handling.

BooseTesting.apprealtest.TestVariable

Minimal concrete AppEvaluation used for variable resolution.

BooseTesting.apprecttest

Unit tests for AppRect. Verifies that rectangles are drawn with correct dimensions and errors are thrown for invalid inputs.

BooseTesting.apprecttest.TestCanvas

Minimal canvas implementation to capture Rect calls for testing.
